div.p: GRG35/16, 1880, no. 6440, indexes of letters received, Department of Lands, State Records of South Australia, Adelaide.

Letter not found; item is a register entry only, of a letter dated 13 November 1881.
[Journals of exploration reqstg
requesting.
listsof plants be published with
M had regularly published lists of plants found during surveyingand exploration journeys, although not always as part of the expedition report. For lists published separately, see, for example, B59.03.01 and B61.13.03, and for examples of enumerations within expedition reports, B60.13.14, B62.11.01, B64.13.05 and B75.04.08. M had made a similar request to publish the plants collectedduring Goyder's NT survey in Mto G. Goyder, 28 March 1870 (in this edition as 70-03-28c). The report of Winnecke's 1883 expedition included an appendix(B84.08.02), which was also published independently in B86.05.01.It is not known whether the present request related to a specific expedition or expeditions or, if it did, to which ones.For Goyder's reply to his letter, seeG .Goyder to M, 21 November 1881 (in this edition as 81-11-21a).
]
